mapper.sql: ID, AGENT_PID, PROFIT_MONTH, AGENT_ID, AGENT_NAME, FRIST_AGENT_ID, FRIST_AGENT_NAME, PARENT_AGENT_ID, PARENT_AGENT_NAME, PRE_LD_AMT, DAY_PROFIT_AMT, DAY_BACK_AMT, BASIC_PROFIT_AMT, BL_AMT, MERCHAN_ORDER_AMT, AGENT_DF_AMT, ADJUST_AMT, ADJUST_ACCOUNT, ADJUST_RESON, ADJUST_TIME, TAX_BASE, TAX_RATE, ADD_TAX_AMT, PRE_NOT_DEDUCTION_AMT1, SUPPOSED_TAX_AMT, REAL_TAX_AMT, NOT_DEDUCTION_TAX_AMT, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, BUS_PLATFORM

distinct
from P_TAX_DEDUCTION_DETAIL
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into P_TAX_DEDUCTION_DETAIL (ID, AGENT_PID, PROFIT_MONTH, AGENT_ID, AGENT_NAME, FRIST_AGENT_ID, FRIST_AGENT_NAME, PARENT_AGENT_ID, PARENT_AGENT_NAME, PRE_LD_AMT, DAY_PROFIT_AMT, DAY_BACK_AMT, BASIC_PROFIT_AMT, BL_AMT, MERCHAN_ORDER_AMT, AGENT_DF_AMT, ADJUST_AMT, ADJUST_ACCOUNT, ADJUST_RESON, ADJUST_TIME, TAX_BASE, TAX_RATE, ADD_TAX_AMT, PRE_NOT_DEDUCTION_AMT1, SUPPOSED_TAX_AMT, REAL_TAX_AMT, NOT_DEDUCTION_TAX_AMT, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, BUS_PLATFORM ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profitMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fristAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fristAgentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentAgentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preLdAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dayProfitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dayBackAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{basicProfitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{blAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{merchanOrderAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{agentDfAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adjustAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adjustAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adjustReson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adjustTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxBase,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{taxRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{addTaxAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{preNotDeductionAmt1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{supposedTaxAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{realTaxAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{notDeductionTaxAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update P_TAX_DEDUCTION_DETAIL
AGENT_PID = #{agentPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROFIT_MONTH = #{profitMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRIST_AGENT_ID = #{fristAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRIST_AGENT_NAME = #{fristAgentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_AGENT_ID = #{parentAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_AGENT_NAME = #{parentAgentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRE_LD_AMT = #{preLdAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_PROFIT_AMT = #{dayProfitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAY_BACK_AMT = #{dayBackAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BASIC_PROFIT_AMT = #{basicProfitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BL_AMT = #{blAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MERCHAN_ORDER_AMT = #{merchanOrderAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AGENT_DF_AMT = #{agentDfAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADJUST_AMT = #{adjustAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADJUST_ACCOUNT = #{adjustAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADJUST_RESON = #{adjustReson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADJUST_TIME = #{adjustTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAX_BASE = #{taxBase,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TAX_RATE = #{taxRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADD_TAX_AMT = #{addTaxAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRE_NOT_DEDUCTION_AMT1 = #{preNotDeductionAmt1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUPPOSED_TAX_AMT = #{supposedTaxAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REAL_TAX_AMT = #{realTaxAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NOT_DEDUCTION_TAX_AMT = #{notDeductionTaxAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUS_PLATFORM = #{busPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update P_TAX_DEDUCTION_DETAIL set AGENT_PID = #{agentPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROFIT_MONTH = #{profitMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRIST_AGENT_ID = #{fristAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRIST_AGENT_NAME = #{fristAgentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_AGENT_ID = #{parentAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_AGENT_NAME = #{parentAgentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRE_LD_AMT = #{preLdAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DAY_PROFIT_AMT = #{dayProfitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DAY_BACK_AMT = #{dayBackAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BASIC_PROFIT_AMT = #{basicProfitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BL_AMT = #{blAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MERCHAN_ORDER_AMT = #{merchanOrderAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AGENT_DF_AMT = #{agentDfAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADJUST_AMT = #{adjustAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADJUST_ACCOUNT = #{adjustAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADJUST_RESON = #{adjustReson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADJUST_TIME = #{adjustTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAX_BASE = #{taxBase,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TAX_RATE = #{taxRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADD_TAX_AMT = #{addTaxAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRE_NOT_DEDUCTION_AMT1 = #{preNotDeductionAmt1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUPPOSED_TAX_AMT = #{supposedTaxAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REAL_TAX_AMT = #{realTaxAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NOT_DEDUCTION_TAX_AMT = #{notDeductionTaxAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUS_PLATFORM = #{busPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

mapper.select:
select a.AGENT_ID, a.PARENT_AGENT_ID,A.AGENT_NAME, NVL(b.BL_AMT,0) BL_AMT, NVL(C.DAYS_PROFIT_AMT,0) DAYS_PROFIT_AMT, NVL(C.RETURN_MONEY,0) RETURN_MONEY, a.BASICS_PROFIT_AMT, NVL(d.DZ_AMT,0) DZ_AMT, NVL(e.ADJUST_AMT,0) ADJUST_AMT, case when nvl(f.TAX_BASE,0) < 0 then f.TAX_BASE else 0 end PRE_TAX_BASE, nvl(f.NOT_DEDUCTION_TAX_AMT,0) PRE_NOT_DEDUCTION_TAX_AMT, nvl(h.PAY_AMOUNT,0) MACHIN_AMT, A.PARENT_AGENT_ID,g.AG_NAME PARENT_AGENT_NAME, nvl(a.TAX,'0') TAX from P_PROFIT_DETAIL_M a
left join ( select AGENT_ID,PARENT_AGENT_ID,sum(BUCKLE_AMT) BL_AMT from P_PROFIT_FACTOR where FACTOR_MONTH='${profitMonth}' group by AGENT_ID,PARENT_AGENT_ID ) b on a.AGENT_ID = b.AGENT_ID and a.PARENT_AGENT_ID = b.PARENT_AGENT_ID
left join ( select AGENT_ID,PARENT_AGENT_ID,sum(SUCCESS_MONEY) DAYS_PROFIT_AMT,sum(RETURN_MONEY) RETURN_MONEY from P_PROFIT_D where REMIT_DATE>='${profitMonth}01' and REMIT_DATE>='${profitMonth}31' and PAY_COMPANY != 'Q000029564' group by AGENT_ID,PARENT_AGENT_ID ) c on a.AGENT_ID = c.AGENT_ID and a.PARENT_AGENT_ID = c.PARENT_AGENT_ID
left join ( select AGENT_ID,PARENT_AGENT_ID,sum(SUPPLY_AMT) DZ_AMT from P_PROFIT_SUPPLY where SUPPLY_DATE='${profitMonth}' and BUS_BIG_TYPE='99' and SUPPLY_TYPE like'%垫资%' group by AGENT_ID,PARENT_AGENT_ID ) d on a.AGENT_ID=d.AGENT_ID and a.PARENT_AGENT_ID = d.PARENT_AGENT_ID
left join P_TAX_DEDUCTION_DETAIL e on e.PROFIT_MONTH = '${profitMonth}' and a.AGENT_ID=e.AGENT_ID and a.PARENT_AGENT_ID=e.PARENT_AGENT_ID
left join P_TAX_DEDUCTION_DETAIL f on f.PROFIT_MONTH = '${preMonth}' and a.AGENT_ID=f.AGENT_ID and a.PARENT_AGENT_ID = f.PARENT_AGENT_ID
left join (select AGENT_ID,BUS_PARENT_AGENT_ID PARENT_AGENT_ID, sum(PAY_AMOUNT) PAY_AMOUNT from O_CASH_SUMMARY_MOUTH where IS_CLO_INVOICE='0' and DAY_STR = '${profitMonth}' group by AGENT_ID,BUS_PARENT_AGENT_ID) h on a.AGENT_ID=h.AGENT_ID and a.PARENT_AGENT_ID=h.PARENT_AGENT_ID
left join A_AGENT g on a.PARENT_AGENT_ID = g.ID
where a.PROFIT_DATE = '${profitMonth}'
